response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am prepared to consider offers that reflect its true significance. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $13,500 for this product. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between acknowledging its value to both of us while ensuring a reasonable return for my investment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations, or if you require further details to make a decision.", "product_price": 13500}
